text:
Plus Two student J. Libin John Joseph (17) of Pilanthottavilai near Kalyal was killed in a road accident near Kadachal village on the Netta-Kalyal road in the early hours on Saturday.

The motorbike in which Joseph was going for tuition along with his friend Jerbin of Kuzhikkalthurai dashed against a private bus coming in the opposite direction.

Joseph was crushed to death under the front wheel of the bus, while his friend Jerbin was admitted in a private hospital with grievous injuries.

The body of the student was sent to Kuzhithurai Government Hospital for post mortem. Kadayalumoodu Police registered a case. The driver of the bus was taken into custody and further investigations are on.
title: Plus Two student killed
